name: Salade de Cresson (Watercress salad)
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: dijon mustard, garlic, olive oil, parsley, tarragon vinegar, watercress, kosher, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon imported mustard such as Dijon or Dusseldorf

recipeInstructions.text: Trim any tough stems from watercress. Rinse in cold water and drain or spin dry. Put in salad bowl.
In another small bowl combine vinegar, garlic and mustard. Using wire whisk, beat in oil. Add salt, pepper and parsley. Pour dressing onto salad and toss.
